snippet.title: THE LEGO MOVIE VIDEOGAME [ HD - PS VITA ]
snippet.description: Honestly this is probably the worst lego game I've ever played , it's not bad it's still good but I think they should've polish it a lil bit and also , the instructions r unclear sometime for example when emmet fell down the hole they wanted u to avoid stuff but they throw out victory flags and gold hearts and it confused me of what i should get or not plus when u hit something u freeze abit so that was a bit let down. another is around 25:20 mark where wild style suppose to run up the wall , they could've said hold the O button because normaly u just tap it when u use emmet , this game is free with my VITA TV but if it's $10 and it looks good to u it's not bad but it's not worth $20 because there r better one out there that is the same price.
